title: Bug 16329[EditorMgmt] Activate editor (F12) does not set focus in editor
description: Bug 16329[EditorMgmt] Activate editor (F12) does not set focus in editor
OB: activate editor shortcut (f12) not always work: for example, moving withctrl+tab from the java editor to the toolbars and then pressing f2 doesntactivate the editor
SR: activate editor shortcut (f12) not always work: for example, moving withctrl+tab from the java editor to the toolbars and then pressing f2 doesntactivate the editor
